name: GBall (Necromancer6482)
description:
Get as far as possible, with the highest score you can get in an infinity randomly generated world. 

Upload your score to the leaderboards and screw over friend over a stupid because one of your friends thought you were hacking.

Space/Left mouse button to change gravity.

S to go small

W to go big.

Trust me, going small will be pretty handy.

On the leaderboard screen the online leaderboard may not show up, you can press "L" to make it show up. You can also try holding "L" if it still won't show up. Don't break it though.

Good luck!
